display_long_description:
Experience the beginning of I AI, a VR-only multiplayer puzzle game for two players. This version includes early game sections, introducing core mechanics, story, and cooperative gameplay—plus the fully playable and replayable I AI Roulette mini-game.

To continue the story and access the full experience, purchase the full version. For the full version, please follow this link: https://www.meta.com/experiences/iai/24036573459287812/
 
# IAI - ROULETTE
Enjoy the different game modes! Take on the challenge against other players.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBUWUlrnlPg
[media]


# MULTIPLAYER ONLY
A cooperative experience built around two players—where communication isn’t optional, it’s essential.
[media]
 
  
# COOP PUZZLE DESIGN
Each player experiences the world differently. No single perspective is enough to solve the game’s challenges.
[media]
 
 
# CROSS PLATFORM
Play together across PC VR and Meta Quest headsets.
[media]
 
 
# NARRATIVE DRIVEN
Discover the story of the Dreamers through fragments of dialogue, environmental storytelling, and shared decisions.
[media]
   
  
# FULL BODY EXPERIENCE
See your entire body—not just your hands—in VR, deepening the sense of presence and expression.
[media]

To continue the story and access the full experience, purchase the full version. For the full version, please follow this link: https://www.meta.com/experiences/iai/24036573459287812/
